Portfolio

Ajshaw.net

This website was made using bootstrap and...well that's it really. Bootstrap and with the help of Sass and grunt this website was born. Source is avalible on github here if you're interested.

Web form

This webform was created using bootstrap and jquery. It points to a business catalyst CRM which keeps a record of the enquiry, this is used for all leads that come via the phone to be then be assigned to someone to chase up once the lead is qualified.
For security this is just a duplication with slight mods.
